A total 120 substance abuse patient intensive outpatient treatment randomly assign one two condition : ( ) standard care plus CM complete goal-related activity relate exercise ( e.g. , improve work , family , transportation issue ) , ( b ) standard care plus CM complete exercise-related activity . Compared receive goal-related CM activity contracting , expect exercise CM condition participate physical activity develop great strength flexibility , decrease drug use , reduce HIV risk behavior , lessen depressive symptom , improve health index .
